about_the_game:
It's a wonderful DLC that supports Nyanco Channel! (ฅ'ω'ฅ)

This DLC adds "Nyanco-san" to Nyanco Desktop Mascot.

How to set or change the DLC mascot you want :

  • Find images in the DLC folder for the mascot character
  • Copy and paste them into the images folder
  • Close the app and restart it

How to find the DLC folders of this app :

Steam Client -> Right-click the app -> Properties -> Local Files -> Browse

How to close the app :

  • Click the mascot and press the “ALT + F4” keys at the same time
  • You can also close the app by pressing the "STOP" button located on your Steam client.

name: Nyanco Desktop Mascot : Nyanco-san

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB / AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 4GB
  • Storage: 10 MB available space

short_description: This DLC adds "Nyanco-san" to Nyanco Desktop Mascot.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
